thread.title: 10 reasons to visit Napa Valley now
thread.title_full: 10 reasons to visit Napa Valley now - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Sophia Markoulakis
title: 10 reasons to visit Napa Valley now
text:
Photo: Russell Yip, The Chronicle Outdoor seating overlooks Napa’s downtown at Matt Lightner’s new restaurant, Ninebark. Outdoor seating overlooks Napa’s downtown at Matt Lightner’s...
Look past the “world class” moniker and you’ll find the less exclusive Napa Valley that the Bay Area knows and loves. We put together a list of things to do and places to visit now through the end of the year that capture the essence of this spectacular destination.
